transcription: Hey everybody this is Rudy Majette with RudySellsCars.com. I just want to show you this new 2012 F-250 that just came in. Lifted, 6 inch lift, custom wheels, 6.7 liter diesel. This truck is a monster. Fender flares, brush guard on the front with lights. Very, very clean.  FX4 off-road package  Black interior, power everything. There you have it. Really, really nice truck. If you're looking for a lifted black F-250, well here it is. Feel free to call me anytime at 832-322-3042.  Remember you can always visit me online at RudySellsCars.com
